Reviews.Title: Phone Ok, Battery Not to Par
Reviews.Author: G. Christie
Reviews.Content: The phone is in good condition and works well. However, the seller did not ship with car charger as advertised. Another purchaser had this same issue. I don't expect to see one coming even though I complained to seller already.The battery discharged without any use over night.It's NOT a Motorola OEM battery.It's a good looking copy but  Motorola OEM batteries are made in Japan, not China.An OEM battery will most likely not have this happen.They are available from Motorola at $41.00Glad the phone was cheap.

Reviews.Title: works fine
Reviews.Author: D-Rahl
Reviews.Content: the phone works fine. i got it as a "Cheap' replacement. but  i should of looked longer. i have found various other phones that are better in price and technology.  V3s are old with few options. the there is no t9 and the battery life sucks. i would not spend the money if i were you.

Reviews.Title: Worst phone and customer service ever!
Reviews.Author: tato
Reviews.Content: To let you know people I don't like to leave bad review for sellers.  I am  really  a fair person/reviewer!These are just a couple or the most difficulties I had with this phone.1) Would not hold charge even for 2 minutes no exargeration.2) When charging the phone and the battery feel like it's about to explode....that's how hot is this cheap phone.Everything about this phone is a bogus, final!I just hate that the seller would not give me back my money for that piece of junk, that I still have had and couldn't used for even 5 minutes.I wished there were option for 0/no star for review not 1, because this one doesn't even deserve 1 STAR!NOT FAIR, NOT FAIR, NOT FAIR!!!!

Reviews.Title: great deal for great phone.
Reviews.Author: Thien Phung
Reviews.Content: i was hesitant because it was REFURBISHED but when i ot the item it looked brand new with all the anti scratch shipping tape on the screen and keypad. my dad needed a new phone that was slim and easy to use. ive had the razr v3 before myself so i knew it was a great candidate. the screen is average size, what sold me was the beautiful light up keyboard for hiss aging eyes.  the phone came with a battery, car charger, and ac charger just like a brand new phone. believe it or not when the razr came out it was top of the line and sold for $500 without a contract. i got it for $44 shipped so i cannot see how u can go wrong. some people cannot operate smart phones and thats the way it will always be. so big ups to amazon, the seller, and Motorola for keeping such a gem on the market.

Reviews.Title: RAZR by Zena Mobile
Reviews.Author: Sylvia
Reviews.Content: Excellent product and company, superior quality.Motorola RAZR V3 Unlocked Phone with Camera, and Video Player--U.S. Version with Warranty (Black)

Reviews.Title: WARNING: Do NOT BUY from these folks!
Reviews.Author: Doug
Reviews.Content: Sold product as NEW and when received, open nicely package new looking like phones but quickly found out they were REFURBISHED! The phones had many issues, but biggest was the phone were unable to send pics because the were DEFECTIVE! THEY MISREPRESENTED the item and they have NO way to contact them. Stay away from these sellers - SCAMS!

Reviews.Title: Rena Mobile is Great
Reviews.Author: Rod Ellis
Reviews.Content: The product was perfect and had many extras in the box.  Took it out the box inserted the SIM an it work perfectly.

Reviews.Title: No car charger
Reviews.Author: Brandon Wilczynski
Reviews.Content: Everything was well and great about this purchase, expect it didn't come with a car charger like it says it does. I never got it, atleast.

Reviews.Title: Excellent product
Reviews.Author: RdHdDgLvr
Reviews.Content: I always hesitate when something is refurbished, but I could not tell that this item was not new when I received it, it looked like it had never been touched.  It works perfectly (bluetooth, speaker etc) and I have had no problems with the finish.  No complaints here!

Reviews.Title: Refurbished Motorola RAZR
Reviews.Author: Hawkans
Reviews.Content: Looked great when I got it. Paint has since worn off in areas. Battery life so-so. Speakerphone hard to hear. Small screen has developed what can best be described as a pink "cataract." But glad to have a nice phone that works, without having to renew any sort of contract.
